The capital city is also named Ngozi. The name Ngozi means blessing. ==Communes== It is divided into the following communes: * Commune of Busiga * Commune of Gashikanwa * Commune of Kiremba * Commune of Marangara * Commune of Mwumba * Commune of Ngozi * Commune of Nyamurenza * Commune of Ruhororo * Commune of Tangara Category:Provinces of Burundi
title: Ngozi Province
